name: Master Lander
description: We are a team of two operating in Warsaw, Poland. So far, making games is mostly a hobby for us and we are still learning. We started off with creating board games back in a day (and even shipped one!) and now we take our first steps into the realms of video games development. We keep it simple with Master Lander, but our ambition is to create games that deliver a meaning trough their mechanics and that provide value to the players for their time and focus spent.
